original_text: If a lion roars in the forest, it means that he has killed an animal to eat. A young lion does not shout unless he has caught something.
korean_text: 사자가 움킨 것이 없는데 어찌 수풀에서 부르짖겠으며 젊은 사자가 잡은 것이 없는데 어찌 굴에서 소리를 내겠느냐

sentences.original_text: If a lion roars in the forest,
it means that he has killed an animal to eat.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 먹기 위해 동물을 죽였다는 것을 의미합니다.

sentences.original_text: A young lion does not shout
